body:
If i setup a package to point at a URL like "file:///somepath/XXX.tar"  i get the error:

==> Installing mypackage
==> Error: Cannot deduce archive type in file:///somepath/mypackage-1.23.4.tar
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code.

If i create a mypackage-1.23.4.tar.gz, and point the package URL at the gzipped version, it works.

However, I don't really have control over the source of this package, so I think that .tar files should work as well.
title: Spack install can't handle .tar files (not gzipped or bzipped)
